verbose_text: Tumor protein p53 functions as an apoptosis facilitator in various diseases, including kidney injury and carcinoma [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], as well as cisplatin induced AKI, with its down-regulation attenuating the injury [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
